body.name: WESTBRONCO Hobo Crossbody Bags for Women 26L Tote Shoulder Bag with Adjustable Strap Large Carryall for Work Gym Everyday
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 5 hrs 44 mins
features: 【Large Capacity】Measure as 18.9'' x 9.4'' x 13.4'' with volume 26L, the hobo crossbody bag is easily take all kinds of items to go to everyday activities.
【Waterproof Nylon Material】Made from lightweight nylon material, stand wear and tear. Don't worry about dirtying the crossbody bag, the material of it is easy to clean.

【Carryall Bag】There's 1 large middle zipper compartment, 1 dedicated compartment for water bottle, and 2 internal compartments inside the bag. The bag is closed with a buckle for easy take and store items.

【For On the Go】The hobo bag can be used as a handbag, crossbody bag or shoulder bag. With the comfortable handy handle and the adjustable shoulder strap, you can adjust your bag to fit different occasions: go to gym, work, or everyday activities.
【After-Sale Service】 We are committed to providing each customer quality goods and credible customer service. If your bag wear out within 1 years, please contact us to get a replacement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE this bag!
reviews.reviewText: The first thing that caught my eye about this bag was the beautiful green color - soft but not like a mint green or sage tone - it's a perfect green. Even the strap has a shiny sheen to it that compliments the color of the bag but has a different texture. It is easy to carry over your arm like in the crook of your elbow, or on your shoulder, or even cross-body which is my preferred way to wear this one. It holds way more stuff than I need to carry at one time so I have to discipline myself that less is more. It is a good choice to carry to the gym, the beach, or on a day trip - in other words, times that I tend to need more items in my purse than on a normal day.The fabric is a sort of nylon so while I wouldn't call it waterproof, I don't have to worry about rain or other water ruining the fabric, and it is quick drying I've noticed. Several people at my church and gym commented on how pretty it is - I think it's the color that made them notice it - it is different from the usual purses I carry and the color makes it stand out. My only critique is that it does not completely close across the top. While there is a "buckle-snap" type closure that pulls the sides together, there is not a zipper that goes all the way across the top of the bag. Unless you plan to turn it upside down and shake it, you should be fine :) One last thing, even though it is a casual nylon bag, it somehow seems to go with everything, just as a neutral color would. Would love to have it in at least one other color before they stop selling it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, roomy, and lots of compartments
reviews.reviewText: Although this bag is so roomy that I’ll probably end up carrying way more things than I need to, I love everything about it so far. The “green” is a very versatile soft green, maybe a shade of celery? I like that there are two options for carrying the bag: short, padded handles, or a seatbelt type of strap for shoulder or crossbody wear. The inside is super spacious but has a large zip pocket that divides the bag into two large sections, each of which have pockets of their own. The bottom is padded to give it some structure (not a lot). In the photos, I’m carrying my iPad in the bag that made it look a little deformed from the weight of it, but I wouldn’t normally carry a single flat item that’s so heavy. The only thing I maybe don’t love about it is that the strap is quite long, even when it’s shortened all the way. This means that when I drape it across the back of a chair at a restaurant, it touches — or almost touches — the ground. I’ve tied a knot in the strap to shorten it for this purpose. Not ideal, but no big deal. I think this casual, everyday bag is a great value for the price and will be using it on the days when I need to carry stuff for the fam and not just my keys, wallet and phone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Don't care for the tapered top
reviews.reviewText: I like the color, neutral sand/taupe. I like the size and the top handle. I like that the interior is light colored so easier to see the contents. However, I find i don't grab this bag as often as some of my others for two reasons:It's slouches so when it isn't filled (which it usually isn't FILLED), it falls and bunches. I now know I like more structure to my bags.Secondly, the tapered top makes the top opening not real big. I didn't realize how much of a nuisance that is. Ug. When I go to reach for something it almost hides in the bottom and sides.Nothing wrong with the bag just my preferences.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this purse to hold a password book, iPad, rather large wallet and a portable bp cuff among lots of other things. I still have room after all that! This thing is massive and easy to clean. I spilled iced coffee all over it and it just wipes off. It’s water resistant, I’m not sure about waterproof (although it feels like it) and has definitely saved some important documents from pouring rain!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s huge and a wind breaker material…
reviews.reviewText: This is my fault I guess I didn’t read the listing throughly. The tote bag is nice and very larger but what I didn’t like was the material. It’s a windbreaker material and it actually makes noise when you move like those old track suits. It will hold a lot for sure but it drives me nuts and I don’t care for it. I can’t say I’d recommend this bag it’s got to much working against it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice large bag
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a bag to have in the back seat of my car to hold my jacket, cardigan, etc. that I like to have on hand - this bag is perfect - it does not stand up on its own, which is fine - it has a snap-type closure on top so it is easy to reach behind my seat and grab what I need around the closure - it is a breathable material that should work well in the car - recommend this bag

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Big Boho Bag
reviews.reviewText: I use this in conjunction with my 'weekender' duffle for getaways. My toiletries, 13" laptop, external keyboard, and headset fit perfectly inside it. It's plush and adorable looking, and the color is exactly as shown. My only concern is that the material may get dirty quickly, but have not confirmed that as of yet. So far, it's been a great addition to my big boho bag collection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s a roomy hangbag with multiple pockets, true to color and seems sturdy enough. It has served me well during a few flights already.However, the overall quality feeling could’ve been better. I know it’s a replica of well known L brand, but still doesn’t justify the cheap look (I do have another one from a different seller and it’s much more impressive)
Es muy amplia, el material es bueno, útil para cuando vas a viajar o cuando vas al gimnasio,
